name: Flappy Bird with Machine Learning
description:
A Flappy Bird clone made using the ML-agents (Machine Learning) package in Unity.

Flappy sees through rays and has learned to avoid obstacles via reinforced learning.

Observations: Rays in moving direction on fixed angles and of fixed length (see image)
Actions: Tapping to fly

Made in collaboration with https://itch.io/profile/ledkarlsson

Note: There is an issue with the time scale slider, screen needs to be maximized first to be able to use it.
